title.narrative: Sustainable development goals in a companies value chains

description.narrative: Companies have great social and environmental impacts related to the SDGs. The greatest impacts may be beyond the scope of the assets it owns or controls with the biggest business opportunities being potentially further upstream or downstream in the value chain. Companies should minimize the negative impacts and maximize the positive ones all across the whole value chain as this is beneficial for both the business owners as well as the society at large. The project supports Finnish companies and their parti cipation in supporting sustainable development in their own field. The project also supports companies in conducting responsible business behavior and in following the relevant international norms. The Project also increases the commitment of companies to support the realization of human rights offers information and tools to help minimize negative human rights impacts and act on changing harmful business practices. The two-year project has been granted a total of 97 500 euro government support.
